title: New CBS font/ line up
content:
CBS Has this new look \*including the word CBS\* and most of their upcoming shows ad's etc. have this distinct font... wonder if anyone else noticed it, and might know what it is...

Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 5.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020005855/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%205_44.png) | 9.09 KB |
author: vmh1976

comments.content: Yes, it actually is Infinity... THANK YOU!
